definition: نبش nabaša u (nabš) to excavate, dig up, dig out of the ground, unearth, exhume, disinter (هـ s.th.); to uncover, lay open, unveil, disclose, reveal, bring to light, bring out into the open (هـ s.th.) II to search, rummage, burrow (في in s.th.), ransack, rifle (في s.th.) نبش nabš excavation, unearthing, digging up; examination, search, exploration; uncovering, disclosure, revelation │ نبش القبور desecration of graves, body snatching
